derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin promontorium, variant (influenced by mons, mont- 'mountain') of promunturium

entry.def: A promontory is a cliff that stretches out into the sea.

example.ex: ...a promontory jutting out into the bay.

means.word_mean: 1. a natural elevation (especially a rocky one that juts out into the sea)
